matrix.db
Interface InstanceListener

public interface InstanceListener

An interface for notification of instance events.

Since:
ADK ?.?

Method Summary
 void instanceChanged(InstanceChangedEvent e)
          Notify InstanceListeners that an instance was changed.
 void instanceCreated(InstanceCreatedEvent e)
          Notify InstanceListeners that an instance was created.
 void instanceDeleted(InstanceDeletedEvent e)
          Notify InstanceListeners that an instance was Deleted.
